text: Lucy Torres-Gomez (born Lucy Marie Martinez Torres; December 11, 1974), is a Filipina actress and politician. She was the Representative for Leyte's 4th legislative district from June 2013 to June 2022. She was a representative before from June 2010 to March 2013. In 2022, she became Mayor of Ormoc. She is married to Ormoc mayor Richard Gomez. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino television actors Category:Politicians from Eastern Visayas Category:Leyte (province)
title: Lucy Torres-Gomez
